title: Latvians in Middle East conflict zone advised to 'follow the guidance of host countries'
summary_full: A statement released by the Latvian Ministry of Foreign Affairs in the wake of an American-Israeli attack on Iran and subsequent counter-attacks by Iran on other Middle Eastern countries recommends that Latvians in the conflict zone follow the advice of whichever country they happen to be in.
